IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: TO ASSURE THE BUILDING AND STRENGTHENING OF THE JEWISH COMMUNITY LOCALLY, NATIONALLY, OVERSEAS AND IN ISRAEL, IN ACCORDANCE WITH JEWISH VALUES.
IRS990.MissionDesc: TO ASSURE THE BUILDING AND STRENGTHENING OF THE JEWISH COMMUNITY LOCALLY, NATIONALLY, OVERSEAS AND IN ISRAEL, IN ACCORDANCE WITH JEWISH VALUES.
IRS990.Desc: GRANTS AND ALLOCATIONS TO SUPPORTED AGENCIES: CONNECTS A DIVERSITY OF HUMANITARIAN PROGRAMS LINKING PEOPLE WHO NEED HELP WITH THOSE WHO CAN PROVIDE IT. THROUGH THE ALLOCATION OF FUNDS CONTRIBUTED BY THOUSANDS OF GENEROUS DONORS, WE FORGE A CONNECTION THAT SAVES AND ENRICHES LIVES.THIS YEAR IN RESPONSE TO THE WAR IN UKRAINE THE FEDERATION RAISED AND DISTRIBUTED FUNDS FOR SOCIAL SERVICES OVERSEAS TO THE JEWISH POPULATION THAT CROSSED THE BORDER TO NEIGHBORING COUNTRIES.

ProgSrvcAccomActy2Grp.Desc: COMMUNITY ENGAGEMENT: SUPPORT FOR A MYRIAD OF PROGRAMS THAT HELP STRENGTHEN JEWISH IDENTITY, CULTURE AND COMMUNITY INCLUDING PROGRAMS FOR SENIORS, CHILDREN, FAMILIES, YOUNG ADULTS AND NEWCOMERS, SCHOLARSHIPS FOR EDUCATIONAL OPPORTUNITIES, COMMUNITY ENRICHMENT PROGRAMS, SUPPORT FOR TEEN PROGRAMS IN ISRAEL, LEADERSHIP DEVELOPMENT PROGRAMS AND FUTURE PLANNING AND COORDINATION OF THE JEWISH COMMUNITY.

ProgSrvcAccomActy3Grp.Desc: COMMUNITY RELATIONS AND COMMUNITY PLANNING: THE JEWISH COMMUNITY RELATIONS COUNCIL (JCRC) DEVELOPS AND ARTICULATES CONSENSUS POSITIONS CONCERNING MATTERS OF PUBLIC IMPORTANCE ON BEHALF OF ITS CONSTITUENCY. IT IS THE PUBLIC AFFAIRS COORDINATING AND ADVISORY BODY FOR THE ORGANIZED JEWISH COMMUNITY OF NW OREGON AND SW WASHINGTON.THE JCRC SEEKS TO PROMOTE MUTUAL UNDERSTANDING AMONG ALL GROUPS IN THE GREATER COMMUNITY AND TO ADVANCE DEMOCRATIC PLURALISM, HARMONIOUS RELATIONSHIPS, AND RESPECT FOR HUMAN DIGNITY AND INDIVIDUAL RIGHTS ACROSS RELIGIOUS, RACIAL, AND ETHNIC LINES. THE JCRC CONSISTS OF A CROSS-SECTION OF PORTLAND JEWRY REPRESENTING AREA ORGANIZATIONS AND SYNAGOGUES.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Part V, Line 4: Intended uses of the endowment fund.
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE FEDERATION'S POLICY IS TO APPROPRIATE ALL INVESTMENT EARNINGS FROM THE PREVIOUS YEAR FOR DISTRIBUTION TO MEET CURRENT NEEDS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Part XI, Line 2d: Other revenue amounts included in F/S but not included on form 990
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: SPECIAL EVENT COSTS NET AGAINST REVENUE $81093

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Part XII, Line 2d: Other expenses and losses per audited F/S

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: JEWISH FEDERATION OF GREATER PORTLAND REPORTS GRANTS ON SCHEDULE I TO THE JEWISH FEDERATIONS OF NORTH AMERICA(JFNA), WHICH IS A 501(C)(3) DOMESTIC U.S. CHARITY. IN ADDITION, JFNA, AND ITS BENEFICIARY AGENCIES, UNITED ISRAEL APPEAL(UIA), A SUBSIDIARY OF JFNA, AND THE AMERICAN JEWISH JOINT DISTRIBUTION COMMITTEE(JDC) - BOTH 501(C)(3) ORGANIZATIONS--EACH FILE A SEPARATE FORM 990 AND DETAILED SCHEDULES F.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Grantmaker's Description of How Grants are Used
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: FOR OUR ALLOCATION RECIPIENTS WE REQUIRE MONTHLY FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AS WELL AS ANNUAL AUDITED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS. FOR OTHERS, WE REQUIRE SEMI-ANNUAL PROGRESS REPORTS ABOUT THE SPECIFIC PROGRAM WE FUND.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part III, Line 4d: Other Program Services Description
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: OTHER PROGRAM SERVICES 4: PJ LIBRARY IS A JEWISH FAMILY ENGAGEMENT PROGRAM IMPLEMENTED ON A LOCAL LEVEL THROUGHOUT THE PORTLAND AREA BY THE JEWISH FEDERATION OF GREATER PORTLAND. THROUGH OUR PARTNERSHIP WITH THE HAROLD GRINSPOON FOUNDATION WE MAIL FREE, HIGH-QUALITY JEWISH CHILDREN'S LITERATURE AND MUSIC TO FAMILIES IN OUR AREA ON A MONTHLY BASIS.PJ LIBRARY IS A PROGRAM OF THE HAROLD GRINSPOON FOUNDATION, MADE POSSIBLE THROUGH PARTNERSHIPS WITH PHILANTHROPISTS AND LOCAL JEWISH ORGANIZATIONS LIKE THE JEWISH FEDERATION OF GREATER PORTLAND. TODAY, FAMILIES IN HUNDREDS OF COMMUNITIES ACROSS THE UNITED STATES AND CANADA ARE ABLE TO EXPLORE THE TIMELESS CORE VALUES OF JUDAISM THROUGH BOOKS AND MUSIC.ALL FAMILIES RAISING JEWISH CHILDREN FROM AGE SIX MONTHS OF AGE THROUGH EIGHT YEARS ARE WELCOME TO ENROLL. THE PROGRAM CURRENTLY SENDS BOOKS TO OVER 1,300 CHILDREN IN OREGON AND SW WASHINGTON.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Line 4: Description of Significant Changes to Organizational Documents
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE BY-LAWS WERE CHANGED TO REFLECT HOW WE ARE ALLOCATING FUNDS TO ELIGIBLE JEWISH ORGANIZATIONS (MORE EXPANSIVE THAN OUR PREVIOUS FOCUS SOLELY ON PARTNER AGENCIES).THE CHANGES ALSO INCLUDED UPDATED LANGUAGE TO REFLECT OUR CORPORATE STRUCTURE THE OFFICERS OF THE FEDERATION SHALL BE A CHAIR OF THE BOARD, ONE OR MORE VICE- CHAIRS, A TREASURER, AND A SECRETARY (SUCH OFFICE TO BE FILLED BY THE PRESIDENT/CHIEF EXECUTIVE).

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Line 11b: Form 990 Review Process
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: FORM 990 IS EMAILED TO THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS FOR REVIEW PRIOR TO FILING.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Line 12c: Explanation of Monitoring and Enforcement of Conflicts
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY IS REVIEWED ANNUALLY. MEMBERS OF THE BOARD ARE REQUIRED TO PROVIDE INFORMATION REGARDING CONFLICTS ON AN ANNUAL BASIS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Line 15b: Compensation Review and Approval Process for Officers and Key Employees
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: COMPENSATION AND BENEFITS ARE DETERMINED BY AN EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE AS PART OF THE EXECUTIVE EMPLOYEE REVIEW PROCESS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Line 19: Other Organization Documents Publicly Available
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: GOVERNING DOCUMENTS, POLICIES AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS ARE AVAILABLE ON REQUEST AT THE FEDERATION OFFICES.
